p: The TEAC (Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity) results have shown that the highest concentration of compounds with antioxidant potential was released in the first 6 h [ 20], while in the DPPH (1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl radical) assay, the antioxidant activity was inversely proportional to the contact time, observing a constant release until the complete reduction of the phenolic compound content in the material ( Figure 5B).
